solidbase.config
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.config.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends Object

This class represents all the configuration from the commandline or from the properties file.

Since:
Apr 1, 2006 7:18:27 PM
Author:
René M. de Bloois

Field Detail

fromAnt

protected boolean fromAnt
Are we running the command line version of SolidBase within Apache Ant?

properties

protected Properties properties
The contents of the properties file. Default this is solidbase.properties in the current folder, with missing properties coming from solidbase-default in the classpath.

driverJars

protected List<String> driverJars
A list of jars that need to be added to the classpath.

secondaryDatabases

protected Map<String,Database> secondaryDatabases
A list of configured databases.

defaultDatabase

protected Database defaultDatabase
The default database.

target

protected String target
Target version to upgrade to.

patchFile

protected String patchFile
The upgrade file to be used.

Constructor Detail

Configuration

public Configuration(ConfigListener progress)
Create a new configuration object. This constructor is used by the Ant Task and the Maven Plugin.

Parameters:
progress - The listener that listens to config events.

Configuration

public Configuration(ConfigListener progress,
                     int pass,
                     String optionDriver,
                     String optionUrl,
                     String optionUserName,
                     String optionPassWord,
                     String optionTarget,
                     String optionPatchFile,
                     String optionPropertiesFile)
Create a new configuration object. This constructor is used by the command line version of SolidBase.

Parameters:
progress - The listener that listens to config events.
pass - Are we in pass 1 or pass 2 of booting?
optionDriver - The optional driver class name for the database.
optionUrl - The optional url for the database.
optionUserName - The optional username for the database.
optionPassWord - The optional password for the database.
optionTarget - The optional target to upgrade to.
optionPatchFile - The optional upgrade file to use.
optionPropertiesFile - The optional path of the properties file.
Method Detail

getPropertiesFile

protected File getPropertiesFile()
Returns the path of the properties file. Can be relative or absolute. Needed for testing.

Returns:
the path of the properties file.

isFromAnt

public boolean isFromAnt()
Are we running the command line version from within Apache Ant?

Returns:
True if we are running the command line version from within Apache Ant, false otherwise.

Returns all the driver jar file names.

Returns:

public String getProperty(String name)
